title: wifi crashed
body: Hey I was active in the whole game and my wifi just killed it self for like the last couple of minutes and I was wondering if I can get my ip from that I was 21/5 and if not that is totally cool like I will link the game info if you need the proof but if not thank you anyways... And thank you for everything, like not suspending my account when I was being toxic but I love the game.   (Sorry for going so off topic)

replies.body:
Unfortunately, we cannot modify your IP or LP for a loss from a match, regardless of reason. I recommend updating your network card's driver as well as your router's firmware to see if those steps prevent this from happening again.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
Thank you I got it working with the advice you gave me.
